sentences.en: A pharmacist can fill any prescription if, in his or her judgment, the prescription is valid.
sentences.cn: 只要药剂师认定处方有效就可按方配药。

sentences.en: A pharmacist compounds drugs from prescribed ingredients.
sentences.cn: 药剂师把处方的各种成分配制成药品.

sentences.en: Always ask the pharmacist for help.
An alert pharmacist will save a doctor from his own mistake by querying a prescription.
sentences.cn: 警惕性很高的药剂师对处方提出疑问而避免了医生的错误.

sentences.en: And you give it to the pharmacist to get your medicine.

sentences.cn: 向你的药剂师征询意见吧。

sentences.en: Miss Jordan considered becoming a pharmacist.
sentences.cn: 乔丹女士想当一名药剂师.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To enhancement law consciousness and ability of self - protect of pharmacist.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高药师的法律、法规意识与 自我 保护能力.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE: To provide references for the legislation of Licensed Pharmacist Legislation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为《药师法》的立法提供参考.

sentences.en: Take this prescription to the pharmacist and then go straight to bed.
sentences.cn: 拿这个处方到药房抓药,然后马上上床休息.

sentences.en: The pharmacist can assist you with the treatment of common ailments.
sentences.cn: 药剂师能帮你治疗一般的病痛。

sentences.en: The pharmacist carefully measured out a dose of herbal medicine and told me how to brew it.
sentences.cn: 药剂师仔细地配好一服草药,并告诉我煎药的方法.

sentences.en: The pharmacist dispensed the prescription with great care.
The pharmacist made up the prescribed medicine.
sentences.cn: 药剂师按方子配好了药.

sentences.en: We had to wait for the pharmacist to make up her prescription.
sentences.cn: 我们只得等药剂师给她配好药。

sentences.en: You have to study to be a pharmacist!
sentences.cn: 你应该好好读书,成为药理专家!

words.tran_cn: 药房；配药学，药剂学；制药业；一批备用药品

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to prepare medicines in a shop or hospital
